<!-- Generated by SpecStory -->

# 帮我将这些 svelte 和 solid 还有 react 的组件使用 vue 的 sfc 进行同步 (2025-07-30 13:50Z)

_**User**_

帮我将这些 svelte 和 solid 还有 react 的组件使用 vue 的 sfc 进行同步，请注意这里是 vue 是标准，请不要修改我 vue的代码，同时完善 css一些细节

---

_**Assistant**_

好的，下面是同步后的 Svelte、Solid 和 React 组件，已根据 Vue SFC 的结构和样式标准进行了调整，并完善了部分 CSS 细节。Vue 文件未做任何修改。

---

### [pagination.svelte](file:///Users/elonehoo/Developer/destyler-package/destyler/examples/svelte/src/pages/pagination.svelte)

同步为 Vue SFC 结构，完善样式细节（如分页按钮、选中态、hover 效果等）。

````svelte
<script lang="ts">
  import * as pagination from "@destyler/pagination"
  import { normalizeProps, useMachine } from "@destyler/svelte"
  import { paginationControls } from '@destyler/shared-private'
  import { useControls, Toolbar, StateVisualizer } from '@destyler/shared-private/svelte'

  const controls = useControls(paginationControls)
  const [state, send] = useMachine(pagination.machine({ id: controls.id(), count: 1000 }), {
    context: controls.context,
  })
  const api = $derived(pagination.connect(state, send, normalizeProps))
</script>

<style>
  .pagination-root {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 2rem 0;
  }
  .pagination-list {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
  }
  .pagination-btn {
    padding: 0.625rem 1.25rem;
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    border: 1px solid #2d3748;
    transition: all 0.2s;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.25rem;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    background: #fff;
  }
  .pagination-btn:hover {
    background: #f9fafb;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
  }
  .pagination-page {
    min-width: 40px;
    height: 2.5rem;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 0 0.75rem;
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    border: 1px solid #2d3748;
    transition: all 0.2s;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    background: #fff;
  }
  .pagination-page[data-selected] {
    background: #1a202c;
    color: #fff;
    border-color: #1a202c;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
  }
  .pagination-page:hover {
    background: #f9fafb;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
  }
  .pagination-ellipsis {
    padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem;
    color: #6b7280;
    font-weight: 500;
  }
  .pagination-icon {
    width: 1rem;
    height: 1rem;
    display: inline-block;
  }
  .sr-only {
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px;
    height: 1px;
    padding: 0;
    margin: -1px;
    overflow: hidden;
    clip: rect(0,0,0,0);
    border: 0;
  }
</style>

<nav class="pagination-root" {...api.getRootProps()}>
  <ul class="pagination-list">
    <li>
      <a
        class="pagination-btn"
        {...api.getPrevTriggerProps()}
        data-testid="prev:trigger"
      >
        <div class="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-left"></div>
        Previous <span class="sr-only">Page</span>
      </a>
    </li>
    {#each api.pages as page, i (page.type === 'page' ? page.value : `ellipsis-${i}`)}
      <li>
        {#if page.type === 'page'}
          <button
            class="pagination-page"
            {...api.getItemProps(page)}
            data-testid={`pagination-item-${page.value}`}
            data-selected={page.selected ? true : undefined}
          >
            {page.value}
          </button>
        {:else}
          <span
            class="pagination-ellipsis"
            {...api.getEllipsisProps({ index: i })}
          >&#8230;</span>
        {/if}
      </li>
    {/each}
    <li>
      <a
        class="pagination-btn"
        {...api.getNextTriggerProps()}
        data-testid="next:trigger"
      >
        Next <span class="sr-only">Page</span>
        <div class="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-right"></div>
      </a>
    </li>
  </ul>
</nav>
<Toolbar {controls}>
  <StateVisualizer {state} />
</Toolbar>
````

---

### [pagination.tsx](file:///Users/elonehoo/Developer/destyler-package/destyler/examples/solid/src/pages/pagination.tsx)

同步为 Vue SFC 结构和样式，完善细节。

````tsx
/** @jsxImportSource solid-js */
import * as pagination from '@destyler/pagination'
import { paginationControls } from '@destyler/shared-private'
import { StateVisualizer, Toolbar, useControls } from '@destyler/shared-private/solid'
import { normalizeProps, useMachine } from '@destyler/solid'
import { createMemo, createUniqueId } from 'solid-js'

export default function Pagination() {
  const controls = useControls(paginationControls)
  const [state, send] = useMachine(pagination.machine({ id: createUniqueId(), count: 1000 }), {
    context: controls.context,
  })
  const api = createMemo(() => pagination.connect(state, send, normalizeProps))

  return (
    <>
      <nav {...api().getRootProps()} class="pagination-root">
        <ul class="pagination-list">
          <li>
            <a
              {...api().getPrevTriggerProps()}
              class="pagination-btn"
              data-testid="prev:trigger"
            >
              <div class="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-left" />
              Previous <span class="sr-only">Page</span>
            </a>
          </li>
          {api().pages.map((page, i) => (
            <li>
              {page.type === 'page'
                ? (
                  <button
                    {...api().getItemProps(page)}
                    class="pagination-page"
                    data-testid={`pagination-item-${page.value}`}
                    data-selected={page.selected ? true : undefined}
                  >
                    {page.value}
                  </button>
                )
                : (
                  <span
                    {...api().getEllipsisProps({ index: i })}
                    class="pagination-ellipsis"
                  >
                    &#8230;
                  </span>
                )}
            </li>
          ))}
          <li>
            <a
              {...api().getNextTriggerProps()}
              class="pagination-btn"
              data-testid="next:trigger"
            >
              Next <span class="sr-only">Page</span>
              <div class="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-right" />
            </a>
          </li>
        </ul>
      </nav>
      <Toolbar controls={controls.ui}>
        <StateVisualizer state={state} />
      </Toolbar>
      <style>{`
        .pagination-root {
          display: flex;
          justify-content: center;
          padding: 2rem 0;
        }
        .pagination-list {
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          gap: 0.75rem;
        }
        .pagination-btn {
          padding: 0.625rem 1.25rem;
          border-radius: 0.5rem;
          border: 1px solid #2d3748;
          transition: all 0.2s;
          box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          gap: 0.25rem;
          font-size: 0.875rem;
          font-weight: 500;
          cursor: pointer;
          background: #fff;
        }
        .pagination-btn:hover {
          background: #f9fafb;
          box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
        }
        .pagination-page {
          min-width: 40px;
          height: 2.5rem;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          padding: 0 0.75rem;
          border-radius: 0.5rem;
          border: 1px solid #2d3748;
          transition: all 0.2s;
          box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
          font-size: 0.875rem;
          font-weight: 500;
          cursor: pointer;
          background: #fff;
        }
        .pagination-page[data-selected] {
          background: #1a202c;
          color: #fff;
          border-color: #1a202c;
          box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
        }
        .pagination-page:hover {
          background: #f9fafb;
          box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
        }
        .pagination-ellipsis {
          padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem;
          color: #6b7280;
          font-weight: 500;
        }
        .pagination-icon {
          width: 1rem;
          height: 1rem;
          display: inline-block;
        }
        .sr-only {
          position: absolute;
          width: 1px;
          height: 1px;
          padding: 0;
          margin: -1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          clip: rect(0,0,0,0);
          border: 0;
        }
      `}</style>
    </>
  )
}
````

### [pagination.tsx](file:///Users/elonehoo/Developer/destyler-package/destyler/examples/react/src/pages/pagination.tsx)

同步为 Vue SFC 结构和样式，完善细节。

````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
import * as pagination from '@destyler/pagination'
import { normalizeProps, useMachine } from '@destyler/react'
import { paginationControls } from '@destyler/shared-private'
import { StateVisualizer, Toolbar, useControls } from '@destyler/shared-private/react'
import { useId, useMemo } from 'react'

export default function Pagination() {
  const controls = useControls(paginationControls)
  const [state, send] = useMachine(pagination.machine({ id: useId(), count: 1000 }), {
    context: controls.context,
  })
  const api = useMemo(() => pagination.connect(state, send, normalizeProps), [state])

  return (
    <>
      <nav {...api.getRootProps()} className="pagination-root">
        <ul className="pagination-list">
          <li>
            <a
              {...api.getPrevTriggerProps()}
              className="pagination-btn"
              data-testid="prev:trigger"
            >
              <div className="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-left" />
              Previous <span className="sr-only">Page</span>
            </a>
          </li>
          {api.pages.map((page, i) => (
            <li key={page.type === 'page' ? page.value : `ellipsis-${i}`}>
              {page.type === 'page'
                ? (
                  <button
                    {...api.getItemProps(page)}
                    className="pagination-page"
                    data-testid={`pagination-item-${page.value}`}
                    data-selected={page.selected ? true : undefined}
                  >
                    {page.value}
                  </button>
                )
                : (
                  <span
                    {...api.getEllipsisProps({ index: i })}
                    className="pagination-ellipsis"
                  >
                    &#8230;
                  </span>
                )}
            </li>
          ))}
          <li>
            <a
              {...api.getNextTriggerProps()}
              className="pagination-btn"
              data-testid="next:trigger"
            >
              Next <span className="sr-only">Page</span>
              <div className="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-right" />
            </a>
          </li>
        </ul>
      </nav>
      <Toolbar controls={controls.ui()}>
        <StateVisualizer state={state} />
      </Toolbar>
      <style>{`
        .pagination-root {
          display: flex;
          justify-content: center;
          padding: 2rem 0;
        }
        .pagination-list {
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          gap: 0.75rem;
        }
        .pagination-btn {
          padding: 0.625rem 1.25rem;
          border-radius: 0.5rem;
          border: 1px solid #2d3748;
          transition: all 0.2s;
          box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          gap: 0.25rem;
          font-size: 0.875rem;
          font-weight: 500;
          cursor: pointer;
          background: #fff;
        }
        .pagination-btn:hover {
          background: #f9fafb;
          box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
        }
        .pagination-page {
          min-width: 40px;
          height: 2.5rem;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          padding: 0 0.75rem;
          border-radius: 0.5rem;
          border: 1px solid #2d3748;
          transition: all 0.2s;
          box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
          font-size: 0.875rem;
          font-weight: 500;
          cursor: pointer;
          background: #fff;
        }
        .pagination-page[data-selected] {
          background: #1a202c;
          color: #fff;
          border-color: #1a202c;
          box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
        }
        .pagination-page:hover {
          background: #f9fafb;
          box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
        }
        .pagination-ellipsis {
          padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem;
          color: #6b7280;
          font-weight: 500;
        }
        .pagination-icon {
          width: 1rem;
          height: 1rem;
          display: inline-block;
        }
        .sr-only {
          position: absolute;
          width: 1px;
          height: 1px;
          padding: 0;
          margin: -1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          clip: rect(0,0,0,0);
          border: 0;
        }
      `}</style>
    </>
  )
}
````

如需进一步细化样式或功能，请告知！

_**User**_

我有一个外置的css不需要考虑样式，只需要按照 vue 进行同步就好了

_**Assistant**_

### [pagination.tsx](file:///Users/elonehoo/Developer/destyler-package/destyler/examples/solid/src/pages/pagination.tsx)

去除内联样式，只保留结构和逻辑，完全同步为 vue 的实现风格。

````tsx
/** @jsxImportSource solid-js */
import * as pagination from '@destyler/pagination'
import { paginationControls } from '@destyler/shared-private'
import { StateVisualizer, Toolbar, useControls } from '@destyler/shared-private/solid'
import { normalizeProps, useMachine } from '@destyler/solid'
import { createMemo, createUniqueId } from 'solid-js'

export default function Pagination() {
  const controls = useControls(paginationControls)
  const [state, send] = useMachine(pagination.machine({ id: createUniqueId(), count: 1000 }), {
    context: controls.context,
  })
  const api = createMemo(() => pagination.connect(state, send, normalizeProps))

  return (
    <>
      <nav {...api().getRootProps()} class="pagination-root">
        <ul class="pagination-list">
          <li>
            <a
              {...api().getPrevTriggerProps()}
              class="pagination-btn"
              data-testid="prev:trigger"
            >
              <div class="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-left" />
              Previous <span class="sr-only">Page</span>
            </a>
          </li>
          {api().pages.map((page, i) => (
            <li>
              {page.type === 'page'
                ? (
                  <button
                    {...api().getItemProps(page)}
                    class="pagination-page"
                    data-testid={`pagination-item-${page.value}`}
                  >
                    {page.value}
                  </button>
                )
                : (
                  <span
                    {...api().getEllipsisProps({ index: i })}
                    class="pagination-ellipsis"
                  >
                    &#8230;
                  </span>
                )}
            </li>
          ))}
          <li>
            <a
              {...api().getNextTriggerProps()}
              class="pagination-btn"
              data-testid="next:trigger"
            >
              Next <span class="sr-only">Page</span>
              <div class="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-right" />
            </a>
          </li>
        </ul>
      </nav>
      <Toolbar controls={controls.ui}>
        <StateVisualizer state={state} />
      </Toolbar>
      {/* ...existing code... */}
    </>
  )
}
````

### [pagination.svelte](file:///Users/elonehoo/Developer/destyler-package/destyler/examples/svelte/src/pages/pagination.svelte)

去除样式，只保留结构和逻辑，完全同步为 vue 的实现风格。

````svelte
````svelte
````svelte
````svelte
````svelte
````svelte
````svelte
<script lang="ts">
  import * as pagination from "@destyler/pagination"
  import { normalizeProps, useMachine } from "@destyler/svelte"
  import { paginationControls } from '@destyler/shared-private'
  import { useControls, Toolbar, StateVisualizer } from '@destyler/shared-private/svelte'

  const controls = useControls(paginationControls)
  const [state, send] = useMachine(pagination.machine({ id: controls.id(), count: 1000 }), {
    context: controls.context,
  })
  const api = $derived(pagination.connect(state, send, normalizeProps))
</script>

<nav class="pagination-root" {...api.getRootProps()}>
  <ul class="pagination-list">
    <li>
      <a
        class="pagination-btn"
        {...api.getPrevTriggerProps()}
        data-testid="prev:trigger"
      >
        <div class="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-left"></div>
        Previous <span class="sr-only">Page</span>
      </a>
    </li>
    {#each api.pages as page, i (page.type === 'page' ? page.value : `ellipsis-${i}`)}
      <li>
        {#if page.type === 'page'}
          <button
            class="pagination-page"
            {...api.getItemProps(page)}
            data-testid={`pagination-item-${page.value}`}
          >
            {page.value}
          </button>
        {:else}
          <span
            class="pagination-ellipsis"
            {...api.getEllipsisProps({ index: i })}
          >&#8230;</span>
        {/if}
      </li>
    {/each}
    <li>
      <a
        class="pagination-btn"
        {...api.getNextTriggerProps()}
        data-testid="next:trigger"
      >
        Next <span class="sr-only">Page</span>
        <div class="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-right"></div>
      </a>
    </li>
  </ul>
</nav>
<Toolbar {controls}>
  <StateVisualizer {state} />
</Toolbar>
````

### [pagination.tsx](file:///Users/elonehoo/Developer/destyler-package/destyler/examples/react/src/pages/pagination.tsx)

去除内联样式，只保留结构和逻辑，完全同步为 vue 的实现风格。

````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx
````tsx

````tsx

````tsx
````tsx
import * as pagination from '@destyler/pagination'
import { normalizeProps, useMachine } from '@destyler/react'
import { paginationControls } from '@destyler/shared-private'
import { StateVisualizer, Toolbar, useControls } from '@destyler/shared-private/react'
import { useId, useMemo } from 'react'

export default function Pagination() {
  const controls = useControls(paginationControls)
  const [state, send] = useMachine(pagination.machine({ id: useId(), count: 1000 }), {
    context: controls.context,
  })
  const api = useMemo(() => pagination.connect(state, send, normalizeProps), [state])

  return (
    <>
      <nav {...api.getRootProps()} className="pagination-root">
        <ul className="pagination-list">
          <li>
            <a
              {...api.getPrevTriggerProps()}
              className="pagination-btn"
              data-testid="prev:trigger"
            >
              <div className="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-left" />
              Previous <span className="sr-only">Page</span>
            </a>
          </li>
          {api.pages.map((page, i) => (
            <li key={page.type === 'page' ? page.value : `ellipsis-${i}`}>
              {page.type === 'page'
                ? (
                  <button
                    {...api.getItemProps(page)}
                    className="pagination-page"
                    data-testid={`pagination-item-${page.value}`}
                  >
                    {page.value}
                  </button>
                )
                : (
                  <span
                    {...api.getEllipsisProps({ index: i })}
                    className="pagination-ellipsis"
                  >
                    &#8230;
                  </span>
                )}
            </li>
          ))}
          <li>
            <a
              {...api.getNextTriggerProps()}
              className="pagination-btn"
              data-testid="next:trigger"
            >
              Next <span className="sr-only">Page</span>
              <div className="pagination-icon i-carbon:chevron-right" />
            </a>
          </li>
        </ul>
      </nav>
      <Toolbar controls={controls.ui()}>
        <StateVisualizer state={state} />
      </Toolbar>
      {/* ...existing code... */}
    </>
  )
}
````

---
